entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kirkland Lake

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this afternoon. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
